mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderHeader.id", a.img_url AS "imgUrl", a.unline_pay_money AS "unlinePayMoney", a.real_money AS "realMoney", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_order_header_unline( id, order_id, img_url, unline_pay_money, real_money, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderHeader.id}, #{imgUrl}, #{unlinePayMoney}, #{realMoney}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_order_header_unline SET order_id = #{orderHeader.id}, img_url = #{imgUrl}, unline_pay_money = #{unlinePayMoney}, real_money = #{realMoney}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
